fullText: Mitchell's folk-opera retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth is a gorgeous, fully realized work of art that manages to be both timeless and urgently contemporary.
dtliExcerpt: Mitchell's folk-opera retelling of the Orpheus and Eurydice myth is a gorgeous, fully realized work of art that manages to be both timeless and urgently contemporary.
